name: Swarm
description: Creatures employing the ability to swarm may attack a full party instead of just the leader, overwhelming them with sheer numbers.

name: Merge
description: This ability allows creatures of the same type to link together in battle, instilling a +1 melee and +1 defense to each of these creatures, instead of just the +1 melee usually granted for supporting creatures.

name: Invisibility
description: Invisible creatures may move across the isle free from detection, only to appear in combat. Surprise!

name: Regeneration
description: Regenerating creatures are restored to maximum loyalty at the beginning of the map phase.

name: Hell Blast
description: The presence of the possessor of this ability sends even the bravest of souls into panic. This is reflected by the loss of -2 loyalty points to all that combat it.

name: Magic Resistance
description: Those possessing Major Magic Resistence receive a %1% chance to ignore the effects of spells directed at them by any wizard.

name: Mighty Blow
description: This fearsome ability gives the possessor a 25% chance to strike a devastating blow in combat. A succesful mighty blow boosts melee strength by +3, and guarantees that at least one damage is done, regardless of the opponents defense rating.

name: Gate
description: This ability allows the unit to teleport into any friendly territory containing a summoning circle by calling on the portals of travel.

name: First Strike
description: Those who possess this ability and lead their party into combat forego ranged combat, and are granted first strike in melee combat. This only applies to attacking parties.

name: See Invisible
description: Those blessed with this ability can see invisible units in adjacent territories.

name: Ignore Missiles
description: Creatures with this ability can avoid the effects of missile fire when in combat.

name: Fire Shield
description: The fire shield reduces the loyalty of any creature that strikes its bearer in melee combat by one.
